drupalNodeEvent.title: Free Ekpar: Commemorating Five Years of the Unjust Detention of Ekpar Asat

field_speakers.processed:
Sophie Richardson (Human Rights Watch), Thor Halvorssen (Human Rights Foundation), Irwin Cotler (Raoul Wallenberg Center), Gregory Niemeyer (University Of California-Berkeley),
Chris Coons (US Senator-Delaware), Martha Minow (Harvard Law School)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: Join Rayhan Asat (Harvard Law School ‘16) in commemorating the fifth anniversary of her brother Ekpar’s imprisonment by the Chinese government. This event is co-sponsored by the Human Rights Foundation, the Raoul Wallenberg Center, the Jewish Movement for Uyghur Freedom, the Trebuchet, Harvard Law School Advocates for Human Rights, and Harvard Jewish Law Students Association.
